preset.translation[0].definitions[0].def: set to operate at a particular time or in a particular way
preset.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The computer records this information at preset intervals.
preset.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a control on a piece of equipment that has been set to operate in a particular way before it is used
preset.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The monitor will automatically go back to thefactory presets.
preset.translation[2].definitions[0].def: to set a piece of equipment to operate in a particular way in advance
preset.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: You can preset the time when the machine comes on.
